subject: Steroids
Athletics and Sports
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: This may seem vindictive, but when do we start getting angry about athletes who scam for dollars? They are scamming their colleagues, and they are scamming you and me.
snippet: This may seem vindictive, but when do we start getting angry about athletes who scam for dollars? They are scamming their colleagues, and they are scamming you and me.
